hero.title: From Motivational Speaker to
hero.description: My journey from earning $100K+ as a motivational speaker to mastering fullstack development and conversion copywriting.

journey.title: The Journey
journey.subtitle: From stage to screen: How I transformed challenges into expertise

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.description: Started as a motivational speaker in New Zealand, earning $100K+ annually through powerful presentations and workshops.

pivot.title: The Pivot
pivot.description: COVID-19 changed everything. Venues closed, speaking gigs vanished. I had to reinvent myself in the digital world.

evolution.title: The Evolution
evolution.description: Mastered JavaScript, React, Node.js, and copywriting. The same skills that made me successful on stage now drive digital success.

ismaCopy.title: ismaCopy Born
ismaCopy.description: Combined development expertise with persuasive writing skills to create high-converting digital solutions for businesses.

story.paragraph1: Before COVID-19, I was living the dream as a motivational speaker in New Zealand, earning over $100,000 annually. I traveled across the country, speaking to packed auditoriums, helping people transform their mindsets and achieve their goals. The stage was my world, and I was thriving.
story.paragraph2: Then March 2020 happened. Overnight, speaking events were cancelled. Venues closed. The industry I had mastered suddenly disappeared. Like millions of others, I faced an uncertain future. But instead of seeing it as an end, I saw it as a beginning.
story.paragraph3: I threw myself into learning JavaScript, React, Node.js, and TypeScript. The same discipline and communication skills that made me successful on stage became my secret weapons in the digital world. I discovered that persuasive speaking and effective coding aren't so different ‚Äì both require clarity, logic, and the ability to solve problems.
story.paragraph4: Today, ismaCopy combines my speaking background with cutting-edge development skills. I create digital solutions that don't just function ‚Äì they persuade, convert, and grow businesses. From New Zealand stages to global screens, the mission remains the same: helping others succeed.
